name: YAKU893
description:
Story

You invade enemy's base to find out the sender of mysterious letter you received.

Gameplay

  • Keep moving forward and knock out all enemies.
  • Before you start game, you can insert coin that is used as a player's life as you want.

Controls

You can change keys in setting.

  • Move Left: Left Arrow
  • Move Right: Right Arrow
  • Move Up: Up Arrow
  • Move Down: Down Arrow
  • Attack: Spacebar
